attributes.action: I would like Sussex Police to review their decision to close the Trek Club.
attributes.background: Sussex Police revoked the license of the Trek Club after a "series of serious incidents." Of which become isolated due to the nature of being the only club in town. Banning the perpetrators would suffice, as this now affects more than the troubled few. Seafordians would just love to see Trek back!

rejection.details:
Policing in Sussex is the responsibility of your local elected Police and Crime Commissioner. You could raise this issue with your PCC:

https://www.sussex-pcc.gov.uk/
